name: Gone Fishin' (itch) (Uncle Hermie)
description:
Gone Fishin' is a fishing experience. Experience quality time at the lake, but don't forget about the real world too.

Controls

Click to Cast Rod and start reeling in

Scroll on your mouse to reel in the fish

Note: Don't try to fullscreen the game unless your monitor is at 800x600, it will look very weird.
